mapper.select: SELECT p.project_id AS projectId, p.client_id AS clientId, c.company_name AS clientName, p.project_name AS projectName, ifnull(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(p.created_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(p.settle_day, '%Y-%m-%d')),'구인 미완료') AS projectDuration, p.manager AS projectManager, p.mphone AS managerPhone, COUNT(DISTINCT a.freelancer_id) AS participant, SUM(ct.fee) AS totalAmount, SUM(ct.total_pay - ct.fee) AS totalFee, ifnull(SUM(ct.total_pay), '-') AS totalSettlement, DATE_FORMAT(p.settle_day, '%Y%m%d') AS settleDate, ifnull(MAX(ct.status), '구인중')AS settleStatus FROM project p LEFT JOIN client c ON p.client_id = c.client_id LEFT JOIN apply a ON a.project_id = p.project_id AND a.is_approved = TRUE LEFT JOIN contract ct ON ct.project_id = p.project_id GROUP BY p.project_id

SELECT -- 기본 정보 p.project_id, p.project_name, p.project_description, p.created_date, p.deadline_date,
-- 관리자 정보 p.manager, p.mphone, c.company_name AS client_name, u.email AS memail,
-- 참여자 정보 (nullable) u2.name AS participant_name, a.sub_category_name AS participant_role, u2.email AS participant_email, u2.phone_num AS participant_phone
FROM project p JOIN client c ON p.client_id = c.client_id JOIN user u ON c.client_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN apply a ON p.project_id = a.project_id AND a.is_approved = TRUE LEFT JOIN freelancer f ON a.freelancer_id = f.freelancer_id LEFT JOIN user u2 ON f.freelancer_id = u2.user_id WHERE p.project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT ct.id as contract_id, p.project_id, p.client_id, c.company_name, p.project_name, CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(MIN(ct.start_date), '%y.%m.%d'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(MAX(ct.end_date), '%y.%m.%d') ) AS project_duration, p.manager as project_manager, p.mphone as manager_phone, IFNULL(SUM(ct.total_pay - ct.fee), 0) AS total_amount, IFNULL(SUM(ct.fee), 0) AS total_fee, IFNULL(SUM(ct.total_pay), 0) AS total_settlement, COUNT(DISTINCT a.freelancer_id) AS participant, DAY(p.settle_day) AS settle_date, ct.client_status AS client_status, MAX(ct.status) AS settle_status
FROM project p LEFT JOIN client c ON p.client_id = c.client_id LEFT JOIN apply a ON a.project_id = p.project_id AND a.is_approved = TRUE LEFT JOIN contract ct ON ct.project_id = p.project_id WHERE p.settle_day <= CURDATE() GROUP BY p.project_id, p.client_id, c.company_name, p.project_name, p.created_date, p.settle_day, p.manager, p.mphone HAVING settle_status IN ('정산완료', '진행중') ORDER BY p.settle_day DESC

SELECT p.project_id, p.client_id, c.company_name, p.project_name, CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(MIN(ct.start_date), '%y.%m.%d'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(MAX(ct.end_date), '%y.%m.%d') ) AS project_duration, p.manager AS project_manager, p.mphone AS manager_phone, IFNULL(SUM(ct.total_pay - ct.fee), 0) AS total_amount, IFNULL(SUM(ct.fee), 0) AS total_fee, IFNULL(SUM(ct.total_pay), 0) AS total_settlement, COUNT(DISTINCT ct.id) AS total_contracts,
-- ✅ 이번달 정산 예정일자 기준으로 완료 인원 세기 ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.position) FROM settlement s JOIN settlelist sl ON s.slist_id = sl.slist_id WHERE sl.project_id = p.project_id AND s.status = '정산완료' AND DATE_FORMAT(sl.settle_date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') ) AS settled_count,
( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a2.freelancer_id) FROM apply a2 WHERE a2.project_id = p.project_id AND a2.is_approved = 1 ) AS participant,
DAY(p.settle_day) AS settle_date, MAX(ct.client_status) AS client_status, MAX(ct.status) AS settle_status
FROM project p JOIN client c ON p.client_id = c.client_id JOIN contract ct ON ct.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE ct.status = '진행중' GROUP BY p.project_id, p.client_id, c.company_name, p.project_name, p.created_date, p.settle_day, p.manager, p.mphone ORDER BY p.settle_day DESC
